overview: Timos and Alice, both married, go on their first illicit date. Timos, just before knocking on Alice's door, closes his eyes and envisions their shared future. What decision will he make when he opens them?

production_companies.name: Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

tagline: He is married. She is married. Before he knocks on her door, he imagines their "double" life. What decision will he make?
title: Départ
